casebody.data:
LILLIE
v.
CARVER 421P10-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Robert Alan Lillie, for Lillie, Robert Alan

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of June 2017 by Petitioner for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
